presentationColumns.name: Requisition Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of amount at distribution level and excludes reinstate, split and replaced line status.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Requisitions.Requisition Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Unprocessed Overdue Requisition Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of amount at distribution level with requisition lines with unprocessed status and crossed the requested delivery date. And unprocessed status requisition lines which are yet to get converted to purchase order or purchase order header without processed date (version 0). This metrics excludes internal requisition and reinstate, split and replaced line status.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Requisitions.Unprocessed Overdue Requisition Amount in Analytics Currency
alternateNames: Unprocessed Overdue Requisition Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Approved Requisition Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of amount at distribution level with requisition lines with approved status. This metrics excludes reinstate, split and replaced line status.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Requisitions.Approved Requisition Amount in Analytics Currency
alternateNames: Approved Requisition Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Processed Requisition Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of amount at distribution level with requisition lines with processed status. And processed status requisition lines are which got converted to purchase order and purchase order header having processed date (version 0).This metrics excludes internal requisition and reinstate, split and replaced line status.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Requisitions.Processed Requisition Amount in Analytics Currency
alternateNames: Processed Requisition Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Unfulfilled Requisition Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of amount at distribution level with requisition lines with unfulfilled status. Unfulfilled status requisition lines are those lines for which purchase order got processed and purchase order line fulfilled flag value is N. This metrics excludes internal requisition and reinstate, split and replaced line status.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Requisitions.Unfulfilled Requisition Amount in Analytics Currency
alternateNames: Unfulfilled Requisition Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Unfulfilled Overdue Requisition Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of amount at distribution level with requisition lines with unfulfilled status and crossed the requested delivery date. And unfulfilled status requisition lines are which purchase order got processed and has purchase order line fulfilled flag value as N. This metrics excludes internal requisition and reinstate, split and replaced line status.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Requisitions.Unfulfilled Overdue Requisition Amount  in Analytics Currency
alternateNames: Unfulfilled Overdue Requisition Amount  in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Fulfilled Requisition Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of amount at distribution level with requisition lines with fulfilled status. And fulfilled status requisition lines are which has purchase order line fulfilled flag value as Y. Purchase order line fulfilled flag will have value as Y only when all the schedule lines for that purchase order line is closed for receiving or invoicing. And fulfilled date is maximum of the schedule receipt dates or invoice dates. This metrics excludes internal requisition and reinstate, split and replaced line status.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Requisitions.Fulfilled Requisition Amount in Analytics Currency
alternateNames: Fulfilled Requisition Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Unfulfilled Overdue Requisition %
presentationColumns.description: This metric shows Unfulfilled Overdue Requisition Amount percentage to overall Requisition Amount for a given period.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Requisitions.Unfulfilled Overdue Requisition % in Analytics Currency
